mastheadInfo.title: Boost your business with
mastheadInfo.description: Turning ideas and challenges into digital experiences.

about.title: My Journey
about.description: Welcome to my personal website. I am a passionate software developer working on making the internet a safer and more accessible place for everyone.For the past four years, I've dedicated my efforts to crafting web and mobile apps spanning diverse domains, including games, the manufacturing industry, and agency projects.

aboutStudio.title: About abstudio
description: We are a  software development agency that specializes in building secure, scalable web and mobile apps.

We leverage cutting-edge technologies to deliver exceptional user experiences and help businesses grow. Our team of experts is dedicated to providing top-notch services that meet your unique needs and exceed your expectations.

services.title: Web development
services.description: We build responsive websites and web apps using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, with a focus on security and user experience.

services.title: Application Security Testing
services.description: We protect your apps from cyber threats through expert security testing and vulnerability assessments.

services.title: Educational Technology Solutions
services.description: We develop secure, scalable platforms for educators and coaches, leveraging AI to enhance learning experiences and automate processes.

servicesStudio.title: Web Development
servicesStudio.description: We craft bespoke websites with elegant design and intuitive user experience.

servicesStudio.title: Tailored Digital Strategies
servicesStudio.description: We design personalized digital marketing strategies to attract clients and grow your business.

servicesStudio.title: Automation and Artificial Intelligence
servicesStudio.description: We optimize your processes and personalize your customer experience with AI and automation.

contact.description: Simply select the date that works for you, and let's dive into your project or answer your inquiries.

projects.title: Partners
projects.description: Partners is an app that connects early-stage entrepreneurs with strategic partners who complement their skills.
projects.impact: 30% increase in entrepreneurs' success rate in finding partners.

projects.title: Launch
projects.description: Launch is an AI-powered platform designed to streamline the process of testing and launching your business ideas.
projects.impact: 50% increase in student engagement and course completion rates.

projects.title: Codercat
projects.description: Codercat is a web and mobile app that provides daily tips on accesibility, security and user experience.
projects.impact: 20% reduction in production costs and 15% increase in overall efficiency.
